description: CNN's Anderson Cooper and Dr. Sanjay Gupta host a global town hall answering your questions about the fight against the coronavirus pandemic.
title: Watch the full CNN coronavirus town hall
title_page: Watch the full CNN coronavirus town hall - CNN
maintext:
(CNN) CNN's Anderson Cooper and Dr. Sanjay Gupta host the CNN global town hall answering your questions about the fight against the coronavirus pandemic. Watch the full event below.
Task force warns of other hotspots across US
Health officials say how we act today could define how we live for the foreseeable future. CNN's Anderson Cooper and Dr. Sanjay Gupta discuss what we've learned about the coronavirus and what we still need to find out.
CDC Director Redfield answers viewer questions
CDC Director Robert Redfield talks with CNN's Anderson Cooper and Dr. Sanjay Gupta about what needs to happen before the United States can reopen.
